ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup dry rub for chicken (such as McCormick® Grill Mates®)
1 pound mesquite wood chips, soaked in water
1 (8 ounce) bottle blue cheese salad dressing

cookingTips: Pat wings dry before applying oil and rub for crispier results
Wings smoke faster than larger cuts; expect 1.5-2 hours at 225°F
Serve with blue cheese dressing for a classic pairing
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Would you parboil the wings first to reduce smoking time? How does smoke penetration differ on smaller pieces?
